name: Multiverser
description:
The game has a mechanic whereby you decide for yourself how you will develop your character during each game:

  • Eventually there will be about 150 skills in the game possibly more
  • Unlock all 15 characters and face the dangers that lurk in the multiverse
  • At the start of each game you buy skills from the available pool, experiment which set will work best in a given situation
  • Develop your characters
  • Discover and defeat all the bosses
  • Get all the achievements
